title: (x) "Starting Over" TV logo script - Rage Italic {Marc O (self)}
content:
Does anyone know the name of the script used in the “Starting Over” logo? Not my favorite, but I may need to recreate the logo due to deadline constraints.

It’s not Mistral, it’s not Spring LP, it’s not...

[http://www.startingovertv.com/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105810/http:/www.startingovertv.com/index.html "http://www.startingovertv.com/index.html")

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Etiquette restaurant logo - Nevison Casual {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105810/http:/typophile.com/node/15329 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Yemenia plane lettering - Futura {Chester} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105810/http:/typophile.com/node/15336 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marcox

comments.content:
I love the subconscious — I came back to see if anyone had an ID and “Rage” popped into my head. Sure enough, it’s Rage Italic:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/rage-italic/italic/testdrive.html?...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009105810/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/rage-italic/italic/testdrive.html?s=Starting+Over&p=60 "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/rage-italic/italic/testdrive.html?s=Starting+Over&p=60")
